cli.description: Core codebase for the infra-buddy commandline interface.

cloudfront-angular.description: A CloudFormation template that creates a CloudFront distribution configured for an Angular 2+ web app. Optimized for infra-buddy

cluster.description: CloudFormation template for deploying a ECS cluster with an application load balancer. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

ecs-service.description: A unified template for creating an ECS service that can act as an API or a headless service. Optimized for use with InfraBuddy

rds-aurora.description: CloudFormation template for deploying a RDS aurora cluster. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

vpc.description: CloudFormation template for deploying a vpc with public and private subnets. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

cluster-cpu-autoscale.description: CloudFormation template for configuring autoscale for an ECS cluster based on CPU usage. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

cluster-memory-autoscale.description: CloudFormation template for configuring autoscale for an ECS cluster based on Memory usage. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

ecs-service-autoscale.description: CloudFormation template for deploying autoscaling an ECS service. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

ecs-service-sqs-threshold.description: CloudFormation template for deploying autoscaling an ECS service. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.

ecs-service-target-connection-error.description: CloudFormation template for configuring autoscale for an ECS service based on number of errors generated by connected application ELB. Optimized for use with infra-buddy.
